attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: When I first heard about this app 💅💅 I knew I had to download it to support our most beloved Lord orange 🍊 😘😘 cuz I’m his number one simp😩😩 but when I opened the app I was in total shock😳 my pet butterfly 🦋 started speaking in tongues 👅 and began to attack me. I suffer from many injuries right now and currently in the emergency room🚑💨 That wasn’t even the worst part😢 After that my speakers started to play “ Hę hAs nO LIps 👄 hOw WiŁl hE GeT a Kišś 💋kīśš” The volume was so loud 💢 it caused my grandmas 👵🏽 hamsters to run away🏃🏃 they met so much to her and were supposed to be tonight’s dinner 🍽 hands down worst app 👎🏿 planning to sue 🤬

attributes.title: Absolutely DISGUSTING 🤬 not the move or the vibe
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. As SOON as I opened the app it TOLD ME I had to DRINK BLEACH in order to be immune from Corona Virus. And so as the 🍊 overlord COMMANDED I do this, I had my AT RISK grandmother do it, so she would get the full amount of bleach needed! She then proceeded to cough and choke and DIED when we took her to the ER and the doctors said they couldn’t do anything, the app opened and played a laughing sound track!!! 😡😡😡 NOT ONLY DID MY GRAN DIE, I WASTED A GOOD BOTTLE OF BLEACH! Also the download is super slow and glitches a lot so that’s not cool. Just generally not vibing with the app, it’s not the move 🤷🏽‍♀️ only download if you want new bleach recipes 🥵

attributes.title: Spamming and health hazards 🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app with high hopes but I was truly disappointed. 😞
As soon as I downloaded the app it kept asking me to allow notifications so after getting asked the same question 20 times I gave in. At first it was okay but after 10 minutes my phone wouldn’t stop getting spammed. It was so annoying it got to the point where I couldn’t even open another app. 

If that doesn’t sound bad enough when I finally managed to open another app I would get pop up pics of the president. 😓
I’m lucky I don’t have a health condition but I’m just worried about other people. You don’t know what health conditions other people have. 
As I said I don’t have a health condition but I still had trouble controlling my heart beat after being scared to almost death multiple times. If I could I would give this app 0 stars. 😡
How can they be so inconsiderate 🤬

attributes.title: NUDES WERE SHOWN
attributes.review: THIS IS ABSOLUTELY DISCUSTING  after I went on the app I saw actual nude if that wasn’t bad enough I got a virus I am truly disappointed and my little child went to go look at what was happening and saw Donald trumps nudes I am traumatized and I think I need therapy I’m just in shock how could our president do something like that I am still getting viruses I may even need a new phone THIS IS NASTY. My phone is even crashing  and it’s glitching everywhere every time I open my screen it’s again like many others said a orange face. Do not get this app. I hope you don’t go through what happened to me

attributes.title: worst app ever ❤️
attributes.review: at first i wanted to show my support for trump and try to get perspective of his views. but shortly after opening the app I started to get really weird threats and the app kept crashing. one of the threats was that a bunch of garden gnomes would come up to my front porch and leave a bunch of cockroaches. as soon as i tried to get rid of the app, a bunch of mini garden gnomes showed up not just at my front porch, but surrounded my house chanting “Trump 2020!” while they left piles of dead or alive cockroaches all around my house. I am traumatized. 0/10 would never get this app again. Trump 2020 ✨💓 in a grave.

attributes.title: Good afternoon
attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: i had been trying to download this app for months but it would never let me. when i finally got the app to download i opened it and it started playing terrible music to the point where i almost clawed my ears off. once the music stopped and the actual content of the app showed i was disgusted by the first post i saw which was a ritual on how to raise my cat from the dead. my current cat who doesn’t know that i had a cat before him got so upset by reading this that he bit one of my fingers off the proceeded to claw my face until it started to bleed. i was in a coma and just woke up after my husband finding me in responsive on the floor. i’m currently on life support and almost lost all of my blood. never download this app the conciquences are terrible. i’m also now extremely depressed and have to go to therapy every day because this app reminded me of my dead cat.

attributes.title: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨eye🙁don't😢wanna😱bee😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆
attributes.review: App is horrible !! 😡 First the T on the app isnt eye catching, its very small and not proper. When i downloaded the app it took forever to download and took up so much space from my phone!! I wanted to give it a try to support my knafa president mister Trump because his complexion is beautiful, but once i opened it, it asked for my phone number 😡😡! I dont like sharing such private things, what if someone wants to be able to use the app but doesnt have a phone number? I wanted to learn about my president but this is a waste of time !!

attributes.title: the biggest glitch
attributes.review: This app was so glitchy it lagged so much. Fake news kept popping up on my phone randomly a after I downloaded this. This app also tried to ask me for most of my passwords on social media. My Siri got hacked by the people behind this app and was calling me fat and ugly also I got a notification from this app saying to drop my puppy off of a bridge. This app asked for my location to send me magazines on trumps social life and behind the senses with him and his wife.... very inappropriate. This app is such a glitch and a spam don’t download this app people reading these reviews.

attributes.title: did you know we’re megan baby?☺️🧚🏻👏🏽😇💞
attributes.review: i am SO upset! donaliald trumpet is not a good president! i mean look at him! he’s orange! like how is that natural?! how do you become orange like that yo?!😭 he doesn’t have hair. (that comb over aint nuthin so don’t even try me on it) my children get SCARED every time they see him! they see him everywhere! which is unacceptable! i’m tired of this man scaring my children! it’s ridiculous that i have to hear screaming at 1 am bc my kids saw donaliald trumPÉt on their television! this app scared my kids so it gets a one star review 😒. don’t vote for him again PLEASE for the sake of the children. #donaldscareskids
